attributes.action: Allow the British public the same entitlements.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dear Gord, Can you give us the British public the same entitlements has you do for members of parliament. Myself and others of this great ripped off land would like some of the gravy off the train. Courtesy of" never knowingly under sold"

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
